name: Ankh: Curse of the Scarab King
name_original: Ankh: Curse of the Scarab King
description:
Have a mind-blowing adventure in ancient Egypt!
Egypt - in times immemorial. The young Assil is confronted with a problem. After a prohibited party in a pyramid he catched a curse of death from the recently buried Scarab king. As if that wasn't enough, he unintentionally comes into possession of Ankh, the symbol of life. By means of this, the god of the dead, Osiris, wants to find an entry to the world of living.
With the Ankh around his neck, Assil sets off to ask the Pharaoh for help, because only the godlike ruler himself will be able to abolish the curse of death. In no time at all, Assil trips up into the wildest adventure that Egypt has ever seen.
